mapper.select: SELECT STEP_TWO.* FROM( SELECT STEP_ONE.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RNUM, XA.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBROADCAST) AS TOTAL_COUNT, IDX, CATEGORY, GENRE, TITLE, GRADE, FOLDERNAME, ALBUMNAME, FILENAME, EXPLANATION, FILE_URL, SUB_URL, PLAY_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %r') AS INSERT_DATE, HIT, PRIORITY FROM TBROADCAST WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY PLAY_DATE DESC ) XA, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) TMP WHERE 1=1 AND XA.CATEGORY LIKE #{param2} AND XA.GENRE LIKE #{param3} AND XA.FOLDERNAME LIKE #{param4} AND (XA.TITLE LIKE #{param5} OR XA.FILENAME LIKE #{param5}) ORDER BY XA.PLAY_DATE DESC, XA.INSERT_DATE DESC, XA.TITLE DESC ) STEP_ONE WHERE STEP_ONE.RNUM <= #{param1} + 15 ) STEP_TWO WHERE STEP_TWO.RNUM >= #{param1} ORDER BY RNUM
SELECT CATEGORY FROM TBROADCAST WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY CATEGORY
SELECT CATEGORY, GENRE FROM TBROADCAST WHERE 1=1 AND CATEGORY LIKE #{param1} GROUP BY CATEGORY, GENRE
SELECT CATEGORY, GENRE, FOLDERNAME FROM TBROADCAST WHERE 1=1 AND CATEGORY LIKE #{param1} AND GENRE LIKE #{param2} GROUP BY CATEGORY, GENRE, FOLDERNAME ORDER BY MAX(PLAY_DATE) DESC, INSERT_DATE DESC

SELECT IDX, CATEGORY, GENRE, TITLE, GRADE, FOLDERNAME, ALBUMNAME, FILENAME, EXPLANATION, FILE_URL, SUB_URL, PLAY_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %r'), HIT, PRIORITY FROM TBROADCAST WHERE idx = #{idx}
